messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] Thank you Joyce

messages.messageBody:
on 1/22/04 6:57 PM, rachel_foodie at rachel_foodie@... wrote:

> You responded to my "interesting comments from my husband" email with
> a fabulous post that really really was great at helping him see
> unschooling from a different perspective.

Awesome! I'm really glad it helped :-) (despite the missing bits!) ;-)

Joyce

messages.subject: Thank you Joyce
messages.msgSnippet: Joyce, You responded to my interesting comments from my husband email with a fabulous post that really really was great at helping him see unschooling from a
messages.messageBody:
Joyce,

You responded to my "interesting comments from my husband" email with
a fabulous post that really really was great at helping him see
unschooling from a different perspective. Showing how it's not so
much a better way than school but a different life altogher from
school...that it is better to learn by pursuing interests than to be
coerced. Somehow, even tho I swear I have said things similar before,
he just "got it" more this time. I read your post to him while he
was taking a bath, so we got to talk about alot of the points you
made. (I didn't just email it to him at work.) I did read other's
posts too, but your seemed to jump out him. He's not "there" yet, but
much more willing to give it a shot. Oh, I could just kiss you,
Joyce!!!

Thanks!
Rachel
